structure.unit: Donations And Conveyances For Pious And Charitable Uses

law.text: Registration statements, applications, reports, contracts or agreements of professional fund-raising counsel, commercial co-venturers and professional solicitors, and all other documents and information required to be filed under sections eighteen to thirty-five, inclusive, or by the division, shall be public records in the office of the division and shall be open to the general public for inspection at such times as the division may prescribe.
